english.segment1: Go tell the world that there is nothing here to hide. It seems like everyone's been covering their eyes
english.segment2: Words that You didn't say were haunting these pages. Faces You didn't make were all I was seeing. The way that they painted You wasn't a picture. of one in control - and I don't think they know who you are
english.segment3: Build brackets around You so You can come out clean. We tried to give You limits that You didn't need
english.segment4: You can order all this heartbreak. You don't need my permission to move. I wish they would just stop trying to filter You out. We've got nothing to prove.
